mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eventPage(num, subject, thumbnail, content, startDate, endDate, memberNum) VALUES (#{num}, #{subject}, #{thumbnail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content}, TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{memberNum})
INSERT INTO eventFile(eventFileNum, eventFilename, num) VALUES (eventFile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{eventFilename}, #{num})
mapper.select: SELECT num, subject, thumbnail, content, startDate, endDate, memberNum FROM eventPage ORDER BY endDate DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
SELECT num, eventfilename, eventfilenum FROM eventFile WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE eventPage SET subject = #{subject}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content}, startDate = TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), endDate = TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WHERE num = #{num}
